CustomField.formula: IF($CustomMetadata.ES_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c==1, DATE( VALUE(MID(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())),1,2) + MID( Fiscal_Year__c,3,4))+1, $CustomMetadata.ES_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c,1)-1 , DATE( VALUE(MID(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY())),1,2) + MID( Fiscal_Year__c,3,4)), $CustomMetadata.ES_Setting__mdt.Default.Start_Month_of_Fiscal_Year__c,1)-1 )
CustomField.label: End Date
